issue.title: [Java] ComplexCopier is skipping null values
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-8705](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8705). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
ComplexCopier should copy null values without skipping them.

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-8705?focusedCommentId=17099987) by Praveen Kumar (praveenbingo):*
Issue resolved by pull request 7106
